ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.1.2_0: Now at that time Venerable Dabba the Mallian was realised when he came to perfection.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.1.3_0: He had realized all there is to be realized by a disciple
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.1.4_0: and had nothing further to do.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.1.5_0: While he was in seclusion he reflected on this,

ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.1.9_0: and he thought, “How may I be of service to the Sangha?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.1.11_0: Perhaps I could assign dwellings for the Sangha and designate the meals?”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.1_0: In the evening Dabba came out of seclusion and approached the Buddha. He bowed, sat down,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.3_0: “Just now, Sir, while I was in seclusion, I thought,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.4_0: I’ve attained all that can be attained by a disciple,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.5_0: I’ve attained all that can be attained by me
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.6_0: I have nothing more to do.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.7_0: and I was wondering how I might be of service to the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.9_0: ‘Why don’t I assign dwellings for the Sangha and designate the meals?’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.2.10_0: I wish to prepare a meal for the Sangha and designate the meals.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.1_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.2_0: “The Sangha should appoint Dabba the Mallian as the assigner of dwellings and the designator of meals.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.3_0: And this is how he should be appointed.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.5_0: and then a competent and capable monk should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.6_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.7_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, it should appoint Venerable Dabba the Mallian as assigner of dwellings and designator of meals.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.9_0: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.10_0: The Sangha appoints Venerable Dabba the Mallian as assigner of dwellings and designator of meals.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.11_0: Any monk who approves of appointing Venerable Dabba the Mallian as assigner of dwellings and designator of meals should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.12_0: Any monk who doesn’t agree should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.13_0: The Sangha has appointed Venerable Dabba the Mallian as assigner of dwellings and designator of meals.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.3.14_0: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”

ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.7.19_0: The monks Mettiya and Bhūmajaka said to each other,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.7.20_0: “Yesterday this householder came to the monastery and spoke with Dabba.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.7.21_0: Dabba must be responsible for this split between this householder and us.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.7.22_0: And because they were dejected, they did not eat as much as they had intended.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.7.23_0: After the meal they returned to the monastery, put their bowls and robes away, and sat outside the monastery gateway, using their upper robe as a back-and-knee strap. They were silent and humiliated, their shoulders drooping and their heads down, glum and speechless.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.1_0: Just then the nun Mettiyā approached them and said,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.3_0: When they said this, the monks Mettiya and Bhūmajaka were not able to respond.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.5_0: a third time she said the same thing,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.7_0: but they still did not respond.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.10_0: “It’s because we’ve been badly treated by Dabba the Mallian, and you’re not taking an interest.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.12_0: “If you like, you could make the Buddha expel Dabba.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.16_0: ‘Venerable Sir, this is not proper or appropriate. There’s fear, distress, and oppression in this district, where none of these should exist.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.18_0: It seems to me that water is burning,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.19_0: Venerable Dabba the Mallian has raped me.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.8.20_0: Saying, “Yes,” she went to the Buddha, bowed, and stood to one side.

ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.2_0: “Dabba, do you remember doing as the nun Mettiyā says?”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.4_0: The Buddha asked the same question
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.5_0: “Dabba, do you remember doing as the nun Mettiyā says?”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.7_0: and a third time the Buddha asked
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.8_0: “Dabba, do you remember doing as the nun Mettiyā says?”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.10_0: He then said, “Dabba, the Dabbas don’t give such evasive answers.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.11_0: If it was done by you, say so;
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.12_0: if it wasn’t done by you, then say that.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.13_0: “Sir, since I was born I don’t recall having sexual intercourse even in a dream, much less when awake.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.14_0: The Buddha said to the monks,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.15_0: “Well then, monks, expel the nun Mettiyā,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.16_0: and these monks are devoted to the path.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.17_0: The Buddha then got up from his seat and entered his dwelling.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.18_0: When the monks had expelled the nun Mettiyā,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.19_0: The monks Mettiya and Bhūmajaka said to them,

ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.21_0: She was urged on by us, because we were angry, displeased, and aiming to make Dabba leave the monastic life.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.22_0: “But did you groundlessly charge Venerable Dabba with failure in morality?”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.24_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:4.9.25_0: “How could the monks Mettiya and Bhūmajaka groundlessly charge Venerable Dabba with failure in morality?”

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.1.1_0: On one occasion monks were disputing with monks, monks with nuns, and nuns with monks. Standing with the nuns, the monk Channa disputed with the monks, making others side with the nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.1.2_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.1_0: “Monks, there are four kinds of legal issues: legal issues arising from disputes; legal issues arising from accusations; legal issues arising from offenses; legal issues arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.2_0: (1a) What is a legal issue arising from a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.3_0: It may be that monks are disputing, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.4_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’, ‘This is the Monastic Law’, ‘This is contrary to the Monastic Law’, ‘This was spoken by the Buddha’, ‘This was not spoken by the Buddha’, ‘This was practiced by the Buddha’, ‘This was not practiced by the Buddha’, ‘This was laid down by the Buddha’, ‘This was not laid down by the Buddha’, ‘This is an offense’, ‘This is not an offense’, ‘This is a light offense’, ‘This is a heavy offense’, ‘This is a curable offense’, ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.5_0: In regard to this, whatever quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.6_0: this is called a legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.7_0: (1b) What is a legal issue arising from an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.8_0: It may be that the monks accuse a monk of failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.9_0: In regard to this, whatever accusation, accusing, allegation, blame, taking sides because of friendship, taking part in the accusation, or supporting the accusation there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.10_0: this is called a legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.11_0: (1c) What is a legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.12_0: There is a legal issue arising from an offense because of the five classes of offenses; there is a legal issue arising from an offense because of the seven classes of offenses—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.13_0: this is called a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.14_0: (1c) What is a legal issue arising from business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.15_0: Whatever is the duty or the business of the Sangha—a legal procedure consisting of getting permission, a legal procedure consisting of one motion, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.2.16_0: this is called a legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.1_0: (2a) What is the root of legal issues arising from disputes?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.2_0: There are six roots of disputes that in turn are the root of legal issues arising from disputes.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.3_0: There are also three unwholesome and three wholesome roots of legal issues arising from disputes.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.4_0: What are the six roots of disputes that in turn are the root of legal issues arising from disputes?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.5_0: It may be that a monk is angry and resentful.

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.10_0: Disputes are unbeneficial and a cause of unhappiness for the general population; they are harmful, detrimental, and a cause of suffering for gods and humans.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.11_0: Monks, when you see such a root of disputes either in yourself or in others, you should make an effort to get rid of it.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.12_0: If you don’t see it, you should practice so that it doesn’t come up in the future.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.3.13_0: That’s how to give up this bad root of disputes.

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.1_0: What are the three unwholesome roots of legal issues arising from disputes?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.2_0: It may be that monks dispute with a mind of greed, with a mind of ill will, with a mind of delusion, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.3_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’, ‘This is the Monastic Law’, ‘This is contrary to the Monastic Law’, ‘This was spoken by the Buddha’, ‘This was not spoken by the Buddha’, ‘This was practiced by the Buddha’, ‘This was not practiced by the Buddha’, ‘This was laid down by the Buddha’, ‘This was not laid down by the Buddha’, ‘This is an offense’, ‘This is not an offense’, ‘This is a light offense’, ‘This is a heavy offense’, ‘This is a curable offense’, ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.4_0: These are the three unwholesome roots of legal issues arising from disputes.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.5_0: What are the three wholesome roots of legal issues arising from disputes?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.6_0: It may be that monks dispute with a mind free from greed, free from ill will, free from delusion, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.7_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, or ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’ ...
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.8_0: ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.4.9_0: These are the three wholesome roots of legal issues arising from disputes.

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.14_0: That’s how to give up this bad root of future lives.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.15_0: Or it may be that a monk is denigrating and controlling,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.16_0: envious and stingy, treacherous and deceitful, one who has bad desires and wrong views, or one who obstinately grasps his own views and only gives them up with difficulty.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.17_0: Any of these is disrespectful and undeferential toward the Teacher, the Teaching, and the Sangha, and he doesn’t fulfill the training.

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.22_0: Monks, when you see such a root of accusations either in yourself or in others, you should make an effort to get rid of it.

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.29_0: failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.30_0: These are the three unwholesome roots of accusations.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.5.31_0: What are the three wholesome roots of accusations?

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.7.3_0: The Sangha is the Sangha Saṅgha the Sangha Saṅgha the Sangha Saṅgha.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.1_0: (3a) Is a legal issue arising from a dispute wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.2_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.3_0: What is a wholesome legal issue arising from a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.4_0: It may be that monks dispute with a wholesome mind, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.5_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, or ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’ ...
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.6_0: ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.7_0: In regard to this, whatever quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.8_0: this is called a wholesome legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.9_0: What is an unwholesome legal issue arising from a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.10_0: It may be that monks dispute with an unwholesome mind, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.11_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, or ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’ ...
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.12_0: ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.13_0: In regard to this, whatever quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.14_0: this is called an unwholesome legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.15_0: What is an indeterminate legal issue arising from a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.16_0: It may be that monks dispute with an indeterminate mind, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.17_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, or ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’ ...
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.18_0: ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.19_0: In regard to this, whatever quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.8.20_0: this is called an indeterminate legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.1_0: (3b) Is a legal issue arising from an accusation wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.2_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.3_0: What is a wholesome legal issue arising from an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.4_0: It may be that monks with a wholesome mind, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.5_0: failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.6_0: In regard to this, whatever accusation, accusing, allegation, blame, taking sides because of friendship, taking part in the accusation, or supporting the accusation there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.7_0: this is called a wholesome legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.8_0: What is an unwholesome legal issue arising from an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.9_0: It may be that monks with unwholesome minds accuse a monk
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.10_0: failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.11_0: In regard to this, whatever accusation, accusing, allegation, blame, taking sides because of friendship, taking part in the accusation, or supporting the accusation there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.12_0: this is called an unwholesome legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.13_0: What is an indeterminate legal issue arising from an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.14_0: It may be that monks with indeterminate minds accuse a monk
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.15_0: failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.16_0: In regard to this, whatever accusation, accusing, allegation, blame, taking sides because of friendship, taking part in the accusation, or supporting the accusation there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.17_0: this is called an indeterminate legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.9.18_0: (3c) Is a legal issue arising from an offense wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.1_0: A legal issue arising from an offense may be unwholesome or indeterminate.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.2_0: there is no legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.3_0: What is an unwholesome legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.4_0: When one transgresses, knowing, perceiving, having intended, having decided—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.5_0: this is called an unwholesome legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.6_0: What is an indeterminate legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.7_0: When one transgresses, not knowing, not perceiving, not having intended, not having decided—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.10.8_0: this is called an indeterminate legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.1_0: (3d) Is a legal issues arising from business wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.2_0: A legal issue arising from business may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.3_0: What is a wholesome legal issue arising from business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.4_0: When the Sangha does a legal procedure with a wholesome mind—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.5_0: whether a procedure consisting of getting permission, a procedure consisting of one motion, a procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, or a procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.6_0: this is called a wholesome legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.7_0: What is an unwholesome legal issue arising from business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.8_0: When the Sangha does a legal procedure with an unwholesome mind—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.9_0: whether a procedure consisting of getting permission, a procedure consisting of one motion, a procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, or a procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.10_0: this is called an unwholesome legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.11_0: What is an indeterminate legal issue arising from business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.12_0: When the Sangha does a legal procedure with an indeterminate mind—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.13_0: whether a procedure consisting of getting permission, a procedure consisting of one motion, a procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, or a procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.11.14_0: this is called an indeterminate legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.1_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute is a legal issue arising from a dispute, not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.2_0: There may be disputes that are a legal issue arising from a dispute; there may be disputes that are not a legal issue; there may legal issues that are not a dispute; there may be legal issues that are also a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.3_0: How is there a dispute that is a legal issue arising from a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.4_0: It may be that monks are disputing, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.5_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, or ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’ ...
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.6_0: ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.7_0: In regard to this, whatever quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.8_0: this is a dispute that is a legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.9_0: How is there a dispute that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.10_0: A mother disputes with her child; a child with their mother; a father with his child; a child with their father; a brother with his brother; a brother with his sister; a sister with her brother; a friend with their friend—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.11_0: this is a dispute that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.12_0: How is there a legal issue that is not a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.13_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation, a legal issue arising from an offense, a legal issue arising from business—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.14_0: this is a legal issue that is not a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.15_0: How is there a legal issue that is also a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.12.16_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute is a legal issue and also a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.1_0: (4b) Are there accusations that are a legal issue arising from an accusation? Are there accusations that are not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not an accusation? Are there legal issues that are also an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.2_0: There may be accusations that are a legal issue arising from an accusation; there may be accusations that are not a legal issue; there may be legal issues that are not an accusation; there may legal issues that are also an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.3_0: How is there an accusation that is a legal issue arising from an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.4_0: It may be that monks accuse a monk
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.5_0: failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.6_0: In regard to this, whatever accusation, accusing, allegation, blame, taking sides because of friendship, taking part in the accusation, or supporting the accusation there is—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.7_0: this is an accusation that is a legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.8_0: How is there an accusation that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.9_0: A mother accuses her child; a child their mother; a father his child; a child their father; a brother his brother; a brother his sister; a sister her brother; a friend their friend—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.10_0: this is an accusation that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.11_0: How is there a legal issue that is not an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.12_0: A legal issue arising from an offense, a legal issue arising from business—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.13_0: this is a legal issue that is not an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.14_0: How is there a legal issue that is also an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.13.15_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation is a legal issue and also an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.1_0: (4c) Are there offenses that are a legal issue arising from an offense? Are there offenses that are not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not an offense? Are there legal issues that are also an offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.2_0: There may be offenses that are a legal issue arising from an offense; there may be offenses that are not a legal issue; there may be legal issues that are not an offense; there may be legal issues that are also an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.3_0: How is there an offense that is a legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.4_0: There is a legal issue arising from an offense because of the five classes of offenses; there is a legal issue arising from an offense because of the seven classes of offenses—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.5_0: this is an offense that is a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.6_0: How is there an offense that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.8_0: this is an attainment/offense that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.9_0: How is there a legal issue that is not an offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.10_0: A legal issue arising from business, a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.11_0: this is a legal issue that is not an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.12_0: How is there a legal issue that is also an offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.14.13_0: A legal issue arising from an offense is a legal issue and also an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.1_0: (4d) Is there business that is not a legal issue arising from business? Is there business that is not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not business? Are there legal issues that are also business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.2_0: There may be business that is a legal issue arising from business; there may be business that is not a legal issue; there may be legal issues that are not business; there may be legal issues that are not business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.3_0: How is there business that is a legal issue arising from business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.4_0: Whatever is the duty or the business of the Sangha—a legal procedure consisting of getting permission, a legal procedure consisting of one motion, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.5_0: this is business that is a legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.6_0: How is there business that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.7_0: The duty to teacher, the duty to a preceptor, the duty to a co-student, the duty to a co-pupil—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.8_0: this is business that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.9_0: How is there a legal issue that is not business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.10_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, a legal issue arising from an offense—
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.11_0: this is a legal issue that is not business.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.12_0: How is there a legal issue that is also business?
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.13_0: A legal issue arising from business is a legal issue and also business.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.14.0.1_0: The resolution and settling of legal issues
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.15.14.1_0: “Mahinda agrees to settle a legal issue arising from a dispute.”
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.16.1_0: “There are two principles for settling a legal issue arising from a dispute:
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.16.2_0: It has been resolved face-to-face and by majority decision.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.16.3_0: Can it be that a legal issue arising from a dispute should be settled not by majority decision,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.16.7_0: It may be that monks are disputing, saying,
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.16.8_0: ‘This is the Teaching’, ‘This is contrary to the Teaching’, ‘This is the Monastic Law’, ‘This is contrary to the Monastic Law’, ‘This was spoken by the Buddha’, ‘This was not spoken by the Buddha’, ‘This was practiced by the Buddha’, ‘This was not practiced by the Buddha’, ‘This was laid down by the Buddha’, ‘This was not laid down by the Buddha’, ‘This is an offense’, ‘This is not an offense’, ‘This is a light offense’, ‘This is a heavy offense’, ‘This is a curable offense’, ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.16.9_0: If those monks are able to resolve that legal issue, this is called the resolution of a legal issue.

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.18.1_0: If those monks are unable to resolve that legal issue while on their way, they should go to that other monastery and say to the resident monks,

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.18.6_0: If the visiting monks are senior to the resident monks, the resident monks should say,

ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.19.2_0: A monk who has ten qualities should be appointed as a sentence:
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.19.3_0: He is virtuous and restrained by the Monastic Code. His conduct is good, he associates with the right people, and he sees danger in minor faults. And he undertakes and trains in the training rules.
ai-pli-tv-kd14:14.19.4_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
